body_html: I was able to run your script successfully on increasing the n_H value till 9000. Going beyond that landed me in segmentation fault similar to yours. The tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.cc script does the calculation of system memory usage. I think this script allocates less memory for computation for your Centos 7 host system config than the required threshold memory for your test.py to execute successfully.

body: I was able to run your script successfully on increasing the n_H value till 9000. Going beyond that landed me in segmentation fault similar to yours. The tensorflow/core/framework/allocator.cc script does the calculation of system memory usage. I think this script allocates less memory for computation for your Centos 7 host system config than the required threshold memory for your test.py to execute successfully.
